eolLevelLayer Struct Reference

the structure used to house the level layer data. The engine supports multiple layers. Your game does not have to. More...

GList * entities
eolKeychain * keys

Detailed Description

the structure used to house the level layer data. The engine supports multiple layers. Your game does not have to.

Definition at line 62 of file eol_level.h.

Field Documentation

eolFloat eolLevelLayer::alpha

translucency to apply to all layer assets. by setting it to 0, you turn off rendering for the layer

Definition at line 66 of file eol_level.h.

a list of background display models.
